projects.title: Urban Heat Island Prediction with FNO
projects.description: Fourier Neural Operator model for predicting land surface temperature across New York City at 70m resolution using ECOSTRESS satellite data.
projects.long_description: My MS thesis project applies ML model to urban climate prediction. The model processes ECOSTRESS thermal observations, ERA5 reanalysis, NDVI vegetation data, and urban morphology parameters to predict spatial temperature patterns.

projects.title: AI Paper Implementations from Scratch
projects.description: Interactive tutorials explaining foundational AI papers with theory and runnable Python code in the browser.

projects.title: CMIP6 Statistical Downscaling
projects.description: Statistical downscaling of CMIP6 climate projections for Virginia using PRISM data with bias correction and quantile mapping.
